mapper.select: /* user-session.findUserSessionInfo */ SELECT US.USR_ID , US.CO_CD , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN OG.LOGIC_ORG_NM_EN ELSE OG.LOGIC_ORG_NM END AS COMP_NM , US.USR_NM , US.USR_NM_EN , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN US.USR_NM_EN ELSE US.USR_NM END AS DISP_USR_NM , US.USR_TYP_CCD , US.POSI_CCD , (SELECT A.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD_MULTLANG A WHERE A.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND A.CCD = 'C005' AND A.DTLCD = US.POSI_CCD AND A.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ) AS POSI_NM , US.EMPNO , US.DEPT_CD , DP.DEPT_NM , DP.DEPT_NM_EN , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN DP.DEPT_NM_EN ELSE DP.DEPT_NM END AS DISP_DEPT_NM , US.VD_CD , US.MOB , US.TEL , US.FAX , US.EML , US.ACCT_EXP_YN , US.ACCT_LCKD_YN , US.PWD_CHG_REQD_YN , US.PRE_LOGIN_DTTM , US.PRE_LOGIN_IP , US.LAST_LOGIN_DTTM , US.LAST_LOGIN_IP , US.USE_YN , US.PWD_INIT_YN , US.PWD_CHG_DTTM , US.EML_RCPT_YN , US.SMS_RCPT_YN , US.TMZ_CCD , US.JOBTIT_CCD , (SELECT A.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD_MULTLANG A WHERE A.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND A.CCD = 'G012' AND A.DTLCD = US.JOBTIT_CCD AND A.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ) AS DISP_JOBTIT_NM , US.HOME_SCR_TYP_CCD , US.LBL_SORT_TYP_CCD FROM USR US LEFT OUTER JOIN LOGIC_ORG OG ON US.TEN_ID = OG.TEN_ID AND US.CO_CD = OG.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND OG.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' AND OG.STS != 'D' LEFT OUTER JOIN LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG OMD ON OG.TEN_ID = OMD.TEN_ID AND OG.LOGIC_ORG_CD = OMD.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND US.DEPT_CD = OMD.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DP ON US.TEN_ID = DP.TEN_ID AND US.CO_CD = OMD.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND US.DEPT_CD = DP.DEPT_CD AND OMD.DEPT_CD = DP.DEPT_CD AND DP.STS != 'D' WHERE US.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND US.USR_ID = #{p} AND US.STS != 'D'

/* user-session.findSupplierUserSessionInfo */ SELECT US.USR_ID , US.CO_CD , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN OG.LOGIC_ORG_NM_EN ELSE OG.LOGIC_ORG_NM END AS COMP_NM , US.USR_NM , US.USR_NM_EN , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN US.USR_NM_EN ELSE US.USR_NM END AS DISP_USR_NM , US.USR_TYP_CCD , US.POSI_CCD , (SELECT A.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD_MULTLANG A WHERE A.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND A.CCD = 'C005' AND A.DTLCD = US.POSI_CCD AND A.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ) AS POSI_NM , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN VD.VD_NM_EN ELSE VD.VD_NM END AS VD_NM , VD.ERP_VD_CD , US.EMPNO , US.DEPT_CD , DP.DEPT_NM , DP.DEPT_NM_EN , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN DP.DEPT_NM_EN ELSE DP.DEPT_NM END AS DISP_DEPT_NM , US.VD_CD , US.MOB , US.TEL , US.FAX , US.EML , US.ACCT_EXP_YN , US.ACCT_LCKD_YN , US.PWD_CHG_REQD_YN , US.PRE_LOGIN_DTTM , US.PRE_LOGIN_IP , US.LAST_LOGIN_DTTM , US.LAST_LOGIN_IP , US.USE_YN , US.PWD_INIT_YN , US.PWD_CHG_DTTM , US.EML_RCPT_YN , US.SMS_RCPT_YN , US.TMZ_CCD , US.JOBTIT_CCD , US.HOME_SCR_TYP_CCD , US.LBL_SORT_TYP_CCD FROM USR US LEFT OUTER JOIN LOGIC_ORG OG ON US.TEN_ID = OG.TEN_ID AND US.CO_CD = OG.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND OG.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' AND OG.STS != 'D' LEFT OUTER JOIN LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG OMD ON OG.TEN_ID = OMD.TEN_ID AND OG.LOGIC_ORG_CD = OMD.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND US.DEPT_CD = OMD.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DP ON US.TEN_ID = DP.TEN_ID AND US.CO_CD = OMD.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND US.DEPT_CD = DP.DEPT_CD AND OMD.DEPT_CD = DP.DEPT_CD AND DP.STS != 'D' LEFT OUTER JOIN VD VD ON US.TEN_ID = VD.TEN_ID AND US.VD_CD = VD.VD_CD AND VD.STS != 'D' WHERE US.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND US.USR_ID = #{p} AND US.STS != 'D' AND US.USR_TYP_CCD ='VD'

SELECT PWD_INPERR_CNT , PWD_INIT_YN , LAST_LOGIN_DTTM , LAST_LOGIN_IP , ACCT_EXP_YN , ACCT_LCKD_YN , PWD_CHG_REQD_YN , PRE_LOGIN_DTTM , PRE_LOGIN_IP FROM USR WHERE usr_id = #{p} AND TEN_ID = #{g.tenant}
